metadata.name: Glow #1
metadata.description:
I was introduced to burlesque scene back when I was based in New York city, since then I was fascinated by characters who perform at burlesque shows. Fast forward 10 years when I've met gentle giant A who "works" as a clown at burlesque venue. A is a giant, very shy and soft spoken. All his life people were staring at him because of his  height, which made him uncomfortable and insecure. Now he works as a clown, people do staire and point, but he is protected by mask or make up. 
A came over to my studio where we took  pictures for few hours. This one is my favourite one. I took it between the shots, when he didn't expect it. You can sense melancholy.
